name: Rogue Drones (Danijel Tkalcec)
description:
This is a prototype of a Rogue-lite Drone Swarm simulator (mine, build, fight, upgrade), written from scratch in Delphi 10.3 Rio using FireMonkey and Pixel Graphics, without using any external resources (everything is painted in code), heavily multi-threaded and optimized for performance, so it can handle 100K+ drones on a decent gaming PC, or 10K+ drones on a mobile device.

64-bit Windows executable, 32-bit Android package (developer build) and full Source Code in Delphi are all available as separate downloads.
